dooyit.ui

Class UIDayBoxContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UIDayBoxContainer

  • public class UIDayBoxContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The UIDayBoxContainer class contains the methods to initialize UIDayBox and update their views.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi
